item.title: Dumped for nearly 1 yr, 1st March
item.description:
This vehicle has been sitting on a free space for nearly a year. It was last reported to fix my street in November last year and it is still there. parking around the area is already limited around the area. Please remove as soon as possible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwood Road, Eltham

item.title: Clovelly Road street name sign damaged and partly missing, 1st March
item.description:
Street name sign for Clovelly Road is broken and partly missing, so it is no longer clearly legible. It would be great if this could be repaired or replaced to keep the street signage tidy and clear - it’s a lovely road and it’s being let down by the current state of the sign.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clovelly Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
